sentence: Israel  launched  its  air-and-ground  offensive  in  Gaza  following  a  surprise  attack  on  Oct.  7  by  Hamas  militants  that  killed  1,200  people,  Israel  says.
Since  then,  more  than  18,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed,  according  to  the  Gaza  health  ministry.
Israel  says  just  over  100  of  its  soldiers  have  been  killed  and  around  600  wounded  since  the  start  of  the  ground  assault.

Israeli  media,  citing  data  released  by  Israel's  military,  say  that  so  far,  13  soldiers  have  been  killed  in  friendly  fire  incidents  and  another  seven  in  "operational  accidents.  "
